Posts.Content: brother on xeloda ( andGemzar) 2000 a day one week on,two weeks off. This for 9 months.   Then up schedule to Gem and Xeloda 2000 per day  2 weeks on one week off BUT got pretty bad hand Foot Syn for two cycles so switched to 75% dosage ie  3 pills  I think. The HFS lessened a lot.  CT scan shows not bigger nor smaller tumor. ok
Posts.Title: Anybody on Xeloda? Any advice?
